title: Episode #23 "Bust-Out"
description:
Michael and Steve are joined by John Ventimiglia (Artie Bucco) one of the Soprano’s most lovable characters. John talks about the early days with Michael and how he got his start in the business. Then he shares some stories about how he originally read for the role of Tony Soprano, his inspiration for the character of Artie and how he once sent an actor to the hospital sort of by accident. 

Then Michael and Steve dig into this week episode which has some of the best acting of the series. Tony wrestles with the thought of spending life behind bars, Carmela almost makes a huge mistake with the wall paper guy and Richie attempts to make his big move with Junior. It’s all on Talking Sopranos Episode #23 “Bust-Out”. Remember to subscribe to the Talking Sopranos podcast wherever you get your podcasts and don’t forget to get your official Talking Sopranos merchandise at talkingsopranos.com
author: talkingsopranos@gmail.com (podjams)
